items.title: UBS calls this used-car retailer a ‘true disruptor and share gainer’
items.description: The bank initiated coverage of the used-car e-commerce platform with a buy rating.

items.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these dividend stocks for stable income
items.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including ConocoPhillips and International Business Machines.

items.title: AI could be revolutionary, but don't ‘lose your diversification,' this wealth advisor says
items.description: AI's impact has yet to be fully realized and investors shouldn't put all of their eggs in one basket, according to Eric Diton of The Wealth Alliance.

items.title: These cheap stocks should have a big 2026, Jefferies says
items.description: Jefferies singled out Lattice Semiconductor and Entergy as two stocks that are likely to see their earnings and sales growth accelerate in 2026.
